### Indice de diversidad de Shannon


```{r}

}

```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
if(!is.na(results$model[[1]])){
  results$model[[1]] %>% 
    stargazer(
      dep.var.labels = "Shannon (H'/transecto)",
      type = "html",
      dep.var.caption = "",
      report = "vc*",
      single.row = T,

      notes = "+p < 0.1, ++p<0.05, +++p<0.001",
      notes.append = FALSE,
      star.char = "+"
    )
}

```
